entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
